meta.title: Ban Passarelli — Italian-Thai Family Restaurant & Treecoma Cannabis
meta.description: Authentic artisan pizza, homemade Italian food, and premium organic cannabis in Thailand. A family story of love, food, and nature.

home.heroSubtitle: Artisan pizza, homemade pasta, and premium organic cannabis — made with love by our family.
home.storyText: Born from an Italian-Thai love story, Ban Passarelli brings authentic Italian flavors to the heart of Thailand. Every pizza is hand-stretched, every sauce is homemade, and every plant is grown with care.
home.featuredSubtitle: Handmade with love, served with a smile

about.title: Our Story
about.intro: We're the Passarelli family — Italian roots, Thai heart, and a passion for good food and natural living.
about.familyText: What started as a dream became Ban Passarelli: a place where Italian tradition meets Thai warmth. Our terrace restaurant sits surrounded by greenery, with a garden where we grow our herbs and cannabis plants organically.
about.foodText: Our recipes come from generations of Italian home cooking. We make our dough fresh every day, our sauces from scratch, and our pasta by hand. No shortcuts, no compromises.
about.cannabisText: Treecoma is our cannabis brand, grown right here in our garden. We believe in organic, sustainable cultivation — no chemicals, just nature and care.
